backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing health checks, access control mixins, event logging, and phase‑1 feature and data models.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product and testimony records into updated structures with new fields and defaults.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for numerous frontend files used in the project.
frontend/docs/data-architecture.md: Documentation of authentication, role model, and frontend data persistence strategy including admin bootstrap and React Query usage.
frontend/docs/design-direction.md: Design specification detailing the dark fantasy theme, palettes, typography, spacing, and component styling.
frontend/docs/local-storage-strategy.md: Documentation of local storage categories, offline behavior, React Query caching, and data consistency rules.
frontend/docs/phase1-features-by-page.md: Lists Phase 1 skeleton features and future enhancements for each site page.
frontend/docs/phase1-planning.md: Outlines project architecture, sitemap, access levels, and Phase 1 scope.
frontend/docs/phase6-qa-test-plan.md: Provides manual QA test cases for authentication, access control, and shop flows.
Describes the feedback workflow, offline-first mechanics, and iteration process.
frontend/docs/production-deployment.md: Explains deployment steps for backend and frontend on IC or external hosts.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the SPA root and main script with metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main React app with routing, lazy‑loaded pages, analytics init, global providers, and a fallback skeleton for page loading.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamSectio: Renders a team showcase using flip cards that display member profiles and expertise on hover.
frontend/src/components/about/TimelineSe: Displays a vertical timeline of company milestones with styled cards and decorative markers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFeedb: Fetches, filters, and displays user feedback with category detection, search tools, and status badges.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminOrder: Loads and filters orders by ID and principal, showing counts and conditional empty states.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Provides product management tools including creation, editing, stock updates, image handling, and form validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminTesti: Displays pending and approved testimonies with loading and error states, and allows admins to remove testimonies via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUsers: Provides forms to grant or revoke admin roles using Principal IDs with validation, mutation handling, and feedback messages.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Portfo: Manages creation and editing of portfolios with category selection, artwork ID input, and backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/adminplus/Testim: Allows creating and editing approved testimonies, including author, content, rating, and approval status.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout with Internet Identity, clears cached data on logout, and shows status indicators.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new users to enter name and email, saving the profile before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Gates admin-only content by checking authentication and user role, showing appropriate access or error screens.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps content and enforces user authentication, showing a login prompt or loading state if needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireOwne: Restricts access to owner‑only areas by checking identity and ownership, showing loading, login, or denial states.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactP: Renders an accordion-based FAQ list for common customer questions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/GuildO: Displays guild orders with loading, error, empty, and populated states, including order status and rewards.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Invent: Manages and displays the shopping cart, including product mapping, totals, and checkout handling.
frontend/src/components/effects/FadeInSe: Applies a fade‑in animation when the section enters the viewport, respecting reduced‑motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/effects/FlipCard: Interactive flip card component toggling front/back content with accessibility and reduced‑motion support.
frontend/src/components/effects/Parallax: Creates a scroll‑based parallax effect using requestAnimationFrame with reduced‑motion handling.
frontend/src/components/feedback/Feedbac: Feedback submission dialog with drafting, validation, identity checks, and offline‑queueing support.
A button that opens the feedback dialog for submitting user feedback.
frontend/src/components/home/Announcemen: Renders a list of announcement cards with title, date, badge, and description.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCar: Implements a carousel that cycles through featured items with navigation controls and detail links.
frontend/src/components/home/QuickLinksG: Displays a grid of quick‑access link cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with background, header, footer, quotes, outlet content, sync status, and analytics.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with info sections, navigation links, legal links, and a credits bar.
frontend/src/components/layout/HeaderNav: Creates the responsive header navigation with links, mobile menu, identity checks, and admin access.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Provides a simple page wrapper that optionally displays a page title and description.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Portfo: Shows a modal with detailed portfolio info including category, description, and artwork list.
Displays a preview grid of portfolios with category badges and a link to the full portfolio page.
frontend/src/components/quotes/RandomQuo: Displays 2–3 randomly selected quotes using a custom hook and renders them in styled cards.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders an accordion listing service offerings with icons, summaries, and detailed feature lists.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductDeta: Shows a modal with full product details, save/remove logic, add‑to‑cart actions, and availability info.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductFlip: Provides a flip‑card UI for products, showing basic info on the front and availability plus actions on the back.
frontend/src/components/shop/ShopCartDra: Implements a cart sidebar with product syncing, coupon validation, quantity controls, and checkout handling.
frontend/src/components/shop/useShopFilt: Custom hook that filters and sorts products based on search text, stock status, and sort options.
frontend/src/components/system/Analytics: Tracks initial and subsequent page views by subscribing to router navigation events.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: A top-level error boundary that logs errors, displays a recovery UI, and allows reload or troubleshooting.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorStat: Renders an error alert that distinguishes offline vs generic errors and offers an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/OfflineSy: UI dialog for viewing, retrying, and managing queued offline mutations with status badges and confirmation prompts.
Floating status widget showing sync progress, errors, and access to the offline queue dialog.
frontend/src/components/system/Troublesh: Dialog that displays and clears locally stored error logs with timestamps and optional stack traces.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Crea: Form dialog for submitting a testimony with rating, text, and optional photo/video upload.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Star: Displays a star-based rating visualization with clamped values.
frontend/src/components/testimonies/Test: Home-page section showing a preview of approved testimonies with ratings and link to full list.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Exports a static list of themed quotes used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the backend actor, updating when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalErrorCapture: Registers global handlers to log runtime errors and unhandled promise rejections locally.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity auth, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: Hook using IntersectionObserver to detect when an element enters view, optionally triggering once.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalCart.ts: Manages a shopping cart in localStorage with add, remove, update, clear, and summary utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineDrafts.ts: Stores, retrieves, expires, and clears form drafts in localStorage keyed by form ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineMutationRep: Replays queued offline actor mutations when back online, updating status and retry counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's reduced-motion preference with cross-browser media query handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps actor calls in React Query for profiles, roles, products, orders, and related mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueuedMutations.ts: Queues mutations for offline use and syncs them when the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useRandomQuotes.ts: Returns stable random quotes per route, updating when the pathname changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecentlyViewed.ts: React hook managing a capped, expiring list of recently viewed products stored in localStorage with add and clear helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Hook persisting state per session in localStorage with automatic session ID generation and expiry.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color themes, fonts, animations, and utility rules for light/dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/analytics.ts: Lightweight analytics module supporting first‑party logging or Google Analytics injection and event/pageview tracking.
frontend/src/lib/errorLogging.ts: Local error logging utilities that read, write, sanitize, and clear error entries stored in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localStorage.ts: Safe localStorage wrapper with versioning, expiry handling, quota fallback, and helpers for clearing stored items.
frontend/src/lib/offlineMutationQueue.ts: Offline queue for pending backend mutations with enqueue, update, failure marking, and clearing operations in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/randomQuotes.ts: Utility selecting 2–3 unique random quotes from a predefined list.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query, Internet Identity, global CSS, and rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders an About page with animated sections describing the creator, including mission and vision cards.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Provides an admin panel with tabs for managing products, orders, users, feedback, and testimonies.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPlus.tsx: Defines an owner‑restricted admin panel for managing portfolios and testimonies.
frontend/src/pages/BlogLore.tsx: Displays a grid of lore‑themed blog posts with category badges, dates, and excerpts.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission handling, and an FAQ section.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Shows a user dashboard with tabs for profile, orders, saved artifacts, cart, and quests using multiple data queries.
frontend/src/pages/FAQ.tsx: Provides a searchable FAQ page with categorized accordion questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/Homepage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, featured carousel, quick links, portfolio and testimony widgets, and feature cards using animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Displays filterable portfolio items with category buttons, loading states, error handling, and a modal for item details.
frontend/src/pages/Privacy.tsx: Shows the privacy policy content in a styled card with sectioned descriptions of data practices.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Presents service details via an accordion, followed by portfolio and testimony widgets and a call‑to‑action for custom services.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Implements the shop page with search, filters, cart drawer, product listing, saved items, and product detail modal handling.
frontend/src/pages/Terms.tsx: Displays the terms of service in a structured card with multiple policy sections.
frontend/src/pages/Testimonies.tsx: Renders the testimonies page, loading approved testimonies, handling errors, and providing UI for creating and displaying testimony cards with media and ratings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current phase, features, requirements, and state metadata for planning and tracking.
